articles.title: Benioff apologizes for National Guard comments - Politico
articles.description: The tech billionaire’s comments had set off a week of Democratic anger.
articles.content:
The fallout from Benioffs initial remarks prompted Silicon Valley angel investor Ron Conway to step down from the board
